---
title: Research activities in the Department of Mathematics
---

Members of our department carry out research in a variety of fields
of pure and applied math. Many faculty members are also active
at the [CUNY Graduate Center](https://www.gc.cuny.edu/), where
they teach classes, participate in seminars, and supervise
graduate students in the [Mathematics](https://www.gc.cuny.edu/mathematics),
[Physics](https://www.gc.cuny.edu/physics),
[Computer Science](https://www.gc.cuny.edu/computer-science),
and [Data Science](https://www.gc.cuny.edu/data-science) programs.
